arts.ttl: Igor Paixão: Reports reveal Liverpool and Arsenal scout Feyenoord’s Brazilian sensation
arts.sum: According to reports from CaughtOffside, Feyenoord's Igor Paixão is on the radar of Liverpool and Arsenal among others.

arts.ttl: Former Feyenoord, Manchester City, PSV, and Arsenal prospect signs for Slovenian giants
arts.sum: Following release by Arsenal, former Feyenoord, Manchester City and PSV defender Omar Rekik (23) has joined NK Marbor (VI).
